ProfessionalSummary: Graphics Designer / Production Artist with 10 years' experience spanning entertainment, health, and fashion industries. Proficient in branding systems, print production, and web graphics. Adaptable and a quick learner while still very detail attentive. Team player and motivator with a proven track record of overseeing quality control of design projects to improve compliance and service delivery.

EducationDetails.Text:
BFA, Graphics Design & Advertising
Bowling Green State University

ExperienceSummary.Description: ~~~~~~~~~~~   is experienced in:  Marketing (Brand Management); and Strategy and Planning (Workflow and Processes).    ~~~~~~~~~~~   has 10 years of work experience.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementStory:
Starting on 7/1/2016, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 4 months:
	Title: Graphic Designer, Project Manager for Ernst & Young

Positions.Description:
Govern creative projects and superintend delivery of content to support marketing and communications initiatives. Liaise with cross-functional teams to augment operations and effectuate effective design strategies to enhance show appeal. Complete final quality checks on files to ensure conformance with branding guidelines.
Key Highlights
• Superintended 400+ graphic design projects and boosted client or show transactions by an average of 25% by developing attractive presentations, which in turn improved information accuracy.
• Led onboarding for new project management workflow system and enhanced company image by improving aesthetic appeal to the target audience.
• Elevated branding levels by developing a cohesive branding system for all marketing materials including presentations, flyers, mailers, brochures, tickets, magazine ads, coupons, booklets, and billboards/web ads.
• Enhanced user engagement across digital platforming by partnering with VP of Marketing and National Marketing Managers to create web ads.
• Trained and assisted Marketing Managers and other team members on Adobe Creative Suite to develop production and graphic materials.
• Slashed production costs on print materials by optimizing content in print production.

Conceptualized and developed high-quality modern designs for print and electronic media. Elicited client requirements and coordinated design projects to facilitate the achievement of project deliverables.
Key Highlights
• Achieved a 100% on-time project delivery rate by swiftly troubleshooting pre-press printing issues and applying proactive fixes to mitigate repeat errors.
• Conformed to all branding guidelines for Ernst & Young by liaising with key stakeholders to administer the full project lifecycle from concept development to final sign-off.

Collaborated with art directors, designers, and developers to produce artworks and finalize press-ready variants. Conducted press checks to verify packaging accuracy and preflighting of files.
Key Highlights
• Attained a 100% quality output rate by evaluating digital and printer proofs to guarantee design precision.
• Boosted team efficiency by executing process improvements to refine file management operations and project workflows.

Created and disseminated creative materials to a diverse client base across print and digital media. Successfully translated subject matter into concrete design for newsletters, promotional materials, and sales collateral. Engineered design themes and elements to enhance product appeal and generate leads.

Achievements: Spearheaded training sessions to enhance proficiency and upskill graphics team, and updated product catalogs for Air Component Systems
Part of a team that created highly persuasive sales and marketing content to drive lead generation and market penetration
QualificationsSummary:
AREAS OF EXPERTISE
• Project Management
• Content Development
• Branding Identity System
• Visual Design & Storytelling

• Color Theory
• Layout / Editorial Design
• Marketing Collateral Creation
• Video Editing & Media Production

• Web Graphics
• Adobe Creative Suite
• Team Leadership & Training
• Quality Control & File Management


TECHNICAL PROFICIENCY
• Advanced in graphic design and production via Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Adobe Premiere, Adobe Animate,
Camera Raw, Lightroom, Adobe XD
• Familiar with basic HTML
• Familiar with After Effects
• Email building via Beefree, Sendgrid, Sendblue

Findings.Message: Each section type should only appear once in a resume.
A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.

The following sections were identified as a skills section type: 'AREAS OF EXPERTISE', 'TECHNICAL PROFICIENCY'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education. THIS IS INCREDIBLY IMPORTANT FOR AI MATCHING ALGORITHMS
Every section should have a clear, unambiguous, commonly-used header on a separate line directly above the content associated with it.

PROFESSIONAL PROFILE

Graphics Designer / Production Artist with 10 years' experience spanning entertainment, health, and fashion industries. Proficient in branding systems, print production, and web graphics. Adaptable and a quick learner while still very detail attentive. Team player and motivator with a proven track record of overseeing quality control of design projects to improve compliance and service delivery.

• Quality Control & File Management


WORK EXPERIENCE
Medieval Times Dinner & Tournament	Nov 2016 - Present | Irving, TX
Production Artist
Govern creative projects and superintend delivery of content to support marketing and communications initiatives. Liaise with cross-functional teams to augment operations and effectuate effective design strategies to enhance show appeal. Complete final quality checks on files to ensure conformance with branding guidelines.
Key Highlights
• Superintended 400+ graphic design projects and boosted client or show transactions by an average of 25% by developing attractive presentations, which in turn improved information accuracy.
• Led onboarding for new project management workflow system and enhanced company image by improving aesthetic appeal to the target audience.
• Elevated branding levels by developing a cohesive branding system for all marketing materials including presentations, flyers, mailers, brochures, tickets, magazine ads, coupons, booklets, and billboards/web ads.
• Enhanced user engagement across digital platforming by partnering with VP of Marketing and National Marketing Managers to create web ads.
• Trained and assisted Marketing Managers and other team members on Adobe Creative Suite to develop production and graphic materials.
• Slashed production costs on print materials by optimizing content in print production.

Ernst & Young	Jul 2016 - Nov 2016 | Irving, TX
Graphic Designer, Project Manager
Conceptualized and developed high-quality modern designs for print and electronic media. Elicited client requirements and coordinated design projects to facilitate the achievement of project deliverables.
Key Highlights
• Achieved a 100% on-time project delivery rate by swiftly troubleshooting pre-press printing issues and applying proactive fixes to mitigate repeat errors.
• Conformed to all branding guidelines for Ernst & Young by liaising with key stakeholders to administer the full project lifecycle from concept development to final sign-off.

Alcon Novartis	Aug 2013 - Mar 2016 | Fort Worth, TX
Production Artist
Collaborated with art directors, designers, and developers to produce artworks and finalize press-ready variants. Conducted press checks to verify packaging accuracy and preflighting of files.
Key Highlights
• Attained a 100% quality output rate by evaluating digital and printer proofs to guarantee design precision.
• Boosted team efficiency by executing process improvements to refine file management operations and project workflows.

Air Components System | GEO-IT Consult	Aug 2010 - Aug 2013 | Richardson, TX
Graphic Designer
Created and disseminated creative materials to a diverse client base across print and digital media. Successfully translated subject matter into concrete design for newsletters, promotional materials, and sales collateral. Engineered design themes and elements to enhance product appeal and generate leads.
Key Highlights
• Spearheaded training sessions to enhance proficiency and upskill graphics team, and updated product catalogs for Air Component Systems.
• Part of a team that created highly persuasive sales and marketing content to drive lead generation and market penetration.

Bowling Green State University
